However , study yet describe direct comparison different nitrate-rich beverage respect bioavailability nitrate/nitrite possible hemodynamic effect . Based gaps current literature , main goal therefore gain insight effect nitrate supplementation different source plasma nitrite level .
DOC.criteria: 18.5 < BMI < 30 kg/m2 Engagement regular physical activity ( > 1 h week ) Use medication Smoking Currently supplement diet nitrate Lactose intolerance
